name: @hmcts/sptribs-case-definition
description: Utility to help creating CCD config definitions

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run genCaseTypeConsts && npm run genCitizenEventNameConsts && npm run genCommonEventNameConsts && npm run genSystemEventNameConsts && npm run genCourtLabelConsts
scripts.genCaseTypeConsts: grep -rh \"public static final String\" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/sptribs/ciccase/NoFaultDivorce.java | sed \"s/    public static final String/export const/\" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genCitizenEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/sptribs/citizen/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genCommonEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/sptribs/common/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genSystemEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/sptribs/systemupdate/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genCourtLabelConsts: grep -rh \"public static final String\" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/sptribs/ciccase/constant | sed \"s/    public static final String/export const/\" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
